little-italy.name: Little Italy
little-italy.description: Straightforward pizzas, subs & cheesesteaks are served over the counter in a low-key setting

italia-mia.name: Italia Mia
italia-mia.description: Old-school Italian favorites, from pizza to pastas & entrees, offered in casual, modest surrounds

paisanos.name: Paisanos
paisanos.description: Italian joint offers a family-friendly choice for dining with a lunch buffet & menu of classic eats

28-grams.name: 28 Grams
28-grams.description: New Pizza Joint, small inside, mainly for takeout, tasty though
